text: @SpeakerPelosi Nance, you assume that all America doesn’t know better? The rate of death caused by the COVID19 flu is a fraction of what you’re saying. We are not going to let you hoodwink us again. This is how you are seen by all America. https://t.co/DMNBmgYZz9
